name: Meditation
info: Focus on quieting your mind. Pay attention to your breath and observe your thoughts.

name: Deep breathing
info: A good way to settle your mind and relax.

name: Stretching
info: Get a bit of extra oxygen into your muscles and keep your tendons flexible.

name: Yoga
info: Center yourself in your body and calm your mind, while also improving your fitness and flexibility.

name: Brisk walk
info: Get your heart rate up with this simple aerobic exercise.

name: Portion of salad
info: Raw greens and other ingredients promote overall health, while also helping those who're counting calories.

name: Portion of fruit
info: A healthy treat. Recommended for daily consumption.

name: Glass of water
info: Drinking enough water is one of the easiest ways to maintain daily health and wellbeing.

name: Article
info: Get out of your social network and take time to read a long-form piece that helps you focus and keeps you informed.

name: Book chapter
info: Make some progress in that favorite book—relax and engage your imagination!

name: Podcast
info: Keep up with your favorite topics.

name: Live music
info: Go enjoy your favorite artists, or discover new ones!

name: Volunteering
info: Take some time to help out in your community. Giving back is one of the best ways to feel fulfilled.

name: Phone banking
info: Reach out to advocate for a cause you're passionate about. Work towards a better future one person at a time.

name: Demonstration
info: Make your voice heard while attracting attention for your cause.

name: Writing
info: Limber up your brain by expressing yourself with the written word. Poetry, fiction, essays, correspondence—all are great ways to share your ideas with others.

name: Music practice
info: Getting good at an instrument is all about practice. Work on perfecting your art so you can share the beauty of music with audiences large or small.

name: Painting
info: Learn the theory of color, try out the techniques of the masters, experiment with your own style, or just break out the finger paint.

name: Drawing
info: Sketch, scribble, design, doodle—all great activities to flex your creative muscles and shift mental gears.
